1.title: Bearing the Heavy Load

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: In the Season 2 premiere, the trainers' bodies and minds are tested. Will their dedication to the people they love be enough to get them through the next four months?

2.title: Fit to Fast Food

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Once reluctant to eat any processed food, Jessi is now getting comfortable with her newfound diet of junk food while Jeremy enjoys the benefits of his new, bigger wife.

3.title: Fe Up

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Cary is hitting some bumps along the road in her journey to pack on the pounds for her friend. Toni gains some compassion for her sister Felicia.

4.title: Fat to Fit

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: After 4 months of strain on their bodies, minds and relationships, the trainers embark on a new stage of their journeys--getting their fit bodies back.

5.title: Losing It

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: With only a few weeks left to meet their weight loss goals, the pressure is on for both the trainers and the clients. Tensions boil over as Cary questions Parneille's accountability.

6.title: The Weight is Over

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: As the final results of the experiment are revealed, we get a glimpse into how the past eight months have transformed the lives of the clients and their trainers.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Fit for his whole life and a trainer for 13 years, JJ is known as "Superman" to his wife and kids. His overweight client Ray hopes that slimming down will boost his profile with adoption agencies and bring him and his wife closer to their dream of starting a family. JJ will abandon fitness and try to gain 60 pounds to help Ray discover his own inner hero.

2.title: Steve & Tasha

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Steve, a trainer of 23 years and his wife Bonnie are known in their small town as "the fit couple." Tasha, wife and mother of three hasn't been in shape in years. She's put on over 100 pounds so Steve sets out to gain as much weight as he can to demonstrate that it's not selfish to take care of oneself.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: When Adonis found himself overwhelmed with depression as a young man, the solution he found to overcome it was fitness. Today he trains others to help them find the same happiness his healthy lifestyle has brought him. His client Alissa has been overweight her entire life. Adonis will stop training and try to gain 70 pounds in the hopes of helping her learn how to change a temporary diet into a lifestyle.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: With a degree in dietetics and 17 years of experience as a trainer, Alex has fitness down to a science. Geoff is a foodie and young professional who wants to lose weight for his upcoming wedding. Alex embarks on a journey to convince Geoff that fitness is about more than appearances and help him change his lifestyle.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Corey is a young and ambitious personal trainer who loves to push his clients to their limits. Raela is a preacher's daughter and a homebody who is trying to love herself enough to get fit. By gaining 60 pounds, Corey tries to put his intensity aside and find a way to help Raela reach her goals.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Since becoming a trainer three years ago, Katie's obsession with health and fitness fuels her passion for experiencing life. Alternatively, Chef Mateo's love for food has completely consumed every aspect of his life. He wants to lose weight in order to have the energy to keep up with his restaurant and his younger bride to be. Katie will leave fitness behind and try to gain 40 pounds in an effort to help Mateo redefine his relationship with food.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: 27-year-old outdoor enthusiast and gym owner Carrie loves inspiring women to lead healthy lives. When not at her gym, she's playing in the mountains with her fianc . Kenlee is a wife and mother whose busy schedule prevents her from making time to exercise and eat right. Carrie will throw away the lifestyle she loves and try to gain as much weight as she can in order to lose it alongside Kenlee and empower her to put herself first.

8.title: Fallon/JD

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: A videographer gets help from an energetic personal trainer and celebrity fitness correspondent.

-1.title: Episode dated 15 March 2016

episode of.title: Fit to Fat to Fit (TV Series 2016– )

-1.plot: Tramell, a young bodybuilder and business owner has one of the best bodies in the country. Jason and Johnny, nicknamed "salty and sweet" enable each other with poor eating and exercise habits. By gaining 60 pounds, Tramell is looking to hold this soon-to-be-married couple accountable for their weight loss while making them accountable to each other.

imdb.plot outline: Fit to Fat to Fit depicts a given athletic trainer who chooses to voluntarily gain a significant amount of weight over the course of several months only to lose the weight alongside their trainee who has weight problems as well. The purpose is to give the trainers a chance to see what it's like to lose a significant amount of weight thus motivating the trainee to exercise and eat healthy.
imdb.title: Fit to Fat to Fit
akas: Fit to Fat to Fit (United States)
plot: It's a show where personal trainers go from fit to fat to help a fat person to lose weight.

_Fit to Fat to Fit_ (qv) depicts a given athletic trainer who chooses to voluntarily gain a significant amount of weight over the course of several months only to lose the weight alongside their trainee who has weight problems as well. The purpose is to give the trainers a chance to see what it's like to lose a significant amount of weight thus motivating the trainee to exercise and eat healthy.
